Interface BinaryInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ZCLCluster
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryInputCluster

    public interface BinaryInput
extends ZCLCluster
    This class represent the Binary Input (Basic) Cluster as defined by the document: ZigBee Cluster Library public release version 075123r04ZB
